name: Ink
blurb: Ink is a unique puzzle platforming game being developed by Misfit Games Co. based in the Midwest!

rewards.reward:
GO MOBILE!
______________________________
Your choice of either the iOS or Android versions of Ink as well as our sincere gratitude!
______________________________
                          [Digital Reward]

STAY HOME!
______________________________
Your choice of either the PC or Mac versions of Ink.  The level editor will be exclusive to PC and Mac versions.
______________________________
                          [Digital Reward]

WHY NOT BOTH?!
______________________________
All previous rewards + Get your name in the game!  You will get a "Contributor" credit and your name will be in the final credits of the game!
______________________________
                          [Digital Reward]

BE A BETA TESTER!
______________________________
Your choice of either the iOS or Android versions of Ink as well as a PC copy.  You will also be invited to join our beta test as we work to provide the most balanced and entertaining experience for all players alike!
______________________________
[Digital Reward]

SOUNDS GOOD!
______________________________
All previous rewards + A digital download of Ink's Soundtrack!
______________________________
                          [Digital Reward]
INK ON YOUR WALL!\r\n______________________________\r\nAll previous rewards + A Kickstarter exclusive 11''x17" Ink poster
REPRESENT!\r\n______________________________\r\nAll previous rewards + An Ink T-Shirt that will be available exclusively though the Kickstarter campaign.

INK N' PAPER!
______________________________
All previous rewards + Make your own impression on Ink!  Have your signature or doodle appear on the notebook paper of a level!  You will also be given an "Ink'd" credit to commemorate your art.


This is your chance to leave your mark on the pages of Ink so get creative!
______________________________
No profanity, copyrighted material, or offensive images.

IT'S BETTER WHEN IT'S REAL!
______________________________
All previous rewards + A physical copy of Ink!  We will be producing a limited amount of the Special Physical Edition of Ink!  With exclusive cover art this is perfect for those who like to hold an actual copy of their game!
______________________________
PC Exclusive

LEVEL ARCHITECT!\r\n______________________________\r\nAll previous  rewards + You can work directly with us to conceptualize your very own level!  We will then take your idea and put it into the final game!  You will also receive a "Co-Designer" credit.

WHAT IS A GAME WITHOUT ART?!\r\n______________________________\r\nAll previous rewards + An Art book featuring everything from the earliest concept images all the way to fully realized level concept charts.  This book will give you a look into how our idea evolved and matured through the entire development process!

COLOR AT YOUR COMMAND!
______________________________
All previous rewards + You can create your very own color mechanic that will become a staple of several levels!  Work directly with us as we take your idea and make it into a fully realized part of the game!  You will also be given an "Associate Designer" credit.
______________________________
Color Mechanics are the core features of the game.  Using different colors grants the player various abilities.  What will your color be?!
